name: Association of Professional Wireless Production Technologies
membership: Mitarbeit in Arbeitsgruppen der CEPT, ETSI, ITU-R und Link16
goal: This association promotes on an international level the efficient and demand-driven provision and use of production frequencies for professional event productions as well as safeguarding such production frequencies for the users on the long run.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
A long-term strategy on the future use of the UHF band
(470-790 MHz) in the European Union / RSPG14-555
